body.name: Travel Steamer for Clothes 1500W, Kolohoso Portable Handheld Garment Clothing Steamer with 140ml Water Tank, Fast Heat Up Fabric Steamer Iron for Home, Outdoor, Furniture
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 25 - 27 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Removes Creases Efficiently, Safe on All Fabrics】- 1500 watts with 20-second fast heat-up, our handheld steamer can give out 25g/min high temperature spray, safe to use on all fabrics. This can help to most effective in removing tough wrinkles and deeply cleaning on any fabric from cotton, wool, silk, fiber without harming your clothes.

【Ergonomic & Foldable Travel Steamer】- This clothing steamer with ergonomic compact size design and foldable handle, is lightweight, can be easily stored in tote, suitcase, drawer. Perfect for business trips, vacations, destination weddings, or any other place where you'll need to smooth and de-wrinkle delicate clothing quickly, safely, and gently!

【No-Splling at Any Angle, Perfect Gift】- The latest electronic pump system ensure it won't leaking or spilling. You can use it at any angle, whaterever you to steam clothes placed horizontally or hung vertically. The high-quality clothing steamer will satisfy your family and friends, will be a perfect gift for family and friends.
【Detachable Large Water Tank, Easy to Clean】 The detachable 140 ml water tank, support for about 10 minutes of continuous steaming, easy to use and clean.

【One-handed Comfortable Handheld Steamer】One-click the steam button, it can keep releasing steam, double-click can lock steam. Package also come with a heat-resistant glove, can protect you from burns.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose KG-1807 clothes steamer ？ 1500 watts with 20-second fast heat-up, effective in removing tough wrinkles and deeply cleaning on all fabric.Ergonomic compact size design and foldable handle, is lightweight, can be easily stored in tote, suitcase, drawer. The latest electronic pump system ensure it won't leaking or spilling at any angle, perfect gift for family and friends.Detachable transparent 140ml Water Tank support for about 10 minutes of continuous steaming, easy to use and clean.The pointed thermostatic panel irons out the folds under the shirt buttons as well as the folds at the neckline.One-handed comfortable handheld steamer, one-click the steam button, it can keep releasing steam, double-click can lock steam.

No-Spilling & 20-second Preheat 1500W handheld steamer heat-up in 20s,has upgrade no-spilling system, quickly and easily release wrinkles vertically or horizontally as an iron without leaking. 140ML Detachable Transparent Water Tank The water tank is easy to use and clean. It support to give out a maximum spray volume of 25g/min about 10minutes of continuous hot steaming. Steam Lock Button With the lock button, simple to control the steam. one-click the steam button, it can keep releasing steam, double-click can lock steam. Extra Steamer Accessories 1* Heat resistant steamer ironing glove: Insulate the heat effectively to prevent steam from scalding your hands1* Measuring Cup

Package Include: 1500W Clothes Steamer *1Heat Resistant Steamer Ironing Glove *1Measuring Cup *1 Knidly Reminder: Please read the manual carefully before usePlease do not touch the top of the garment steamer to avoid burnsThe voltage is 110V~120V, and it cannot be used in countries with a voltage exceeding 120V such as Europe, the United Kingdom, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Clothes Steamer/Iron
reviews.reviewText: This has been a time saver when it comes to getting my husband ready for work in the morning! His company work shirts, and occasional flannels can be extremely difficult to iron or fluff out the constant wrinkles. With this steamer, it works like magic on them! I love that it is easy to fold up for storage. The tank is large enough to do a few items at a time before refilling. It has an iron plate, so smoothing out his collars, and pocket flaps are easy to press out in a jiffy! Most steamers you can only use upright, but this one has the handy capability to use while clothes are laying on a table or ironing board. It also comes with a safety mitt so you aren’t risking burning yourself! My husband feels more confident at work knowing he isn’t looking like a wrinkled mess when going to work, and I don’t have to work on one shirt for an hour for the most minimal results. I now can have them looking pressed and spiffy within 5 minutes! I highly recommend this steamer for anyone having problems with tough wrinkles. It’s also a perfect travel companion vs taking a bulky iron! I couldn’t be more pleased with this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this steamer!
reviews.reviewText: Loving this steamer and even though this is a travel version, I choose to use it over my larger one at home. Easy to fill and doesn’t leak. Heats up very quickly and produces a lot of steam. Can use it upright or face down. The steamer face works like a little iron around buttons. It does fold down for travel and is a good size. Not tiny, but I have learned if I need a steamer on a trip, it is worth packing something that works even if little larger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My first review on this product was poor due to the fact that the product didn’t work, but I had to change my review because the company immediately sent me a replacement, showing how important customer satisfaction is to them. Product works very well and is great for traveling. Definitely recommend 👍🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great little steamer. It's actually a mid-size compared to some on the market. I travel quite often and do not leave home without a steamer. This has been performing perfectly and it's very easy to use. It heats up very quickly and so far it does not "spit" or drip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do Not Buy!!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Awful product Do Not Buy!!!!!! Never gets hot enough and no steam! I wish I could return but it’s past the timeline. Gave it one star ⭐️ because I had to in order to submit review

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as best as I expected:)
reviews.reviewText: This worked great to steam out the wrinkles in my graduation gown! It did sometimes drip water, but I think it was depending on how I was holding it. I read so many reviews for so many different products, this seemed to be an issue for all of them, so I wasn’t too bothered when it started.I do not recommend using the glove it came with. Mine was falling apart and what looked like snow came out from it, decided to try it anyways and burned my hand :( definitely get something more durable if you plan on using a glove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little unit!
reviews.reviewText: For the price, you can't beat this little steamer! Doesn't leak water everywhere, heats up very quickly and folds in half for easy storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this steamer, as it is light weight, easy to store, and works well!

This portable steamer is fantastic. I travel with it for work. It pressed my pants, jackets and blouses so quickly without worrying about those unsightly marks most cheap hotel irons make. It is very powerful and does a great job. I will take this with me everywhere. I have a standup steamer at home and honestly this is comparable. I highly recommend this product for everyday home use as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Capacidad de agua limitada y vapor no elimina arrugas

reviews.reviewText: Saved me on my trip! Love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Will WET everything you try to steam iron
reviews.reviewText: We really wanted to like this steamer as it's portable and seems quite strong. The first time we used it, it worked fine. HOWEVER, now every time we use it, our clothes would just get really wet from it and won't even be ironed properly. Not sure if we just got a defective one but this is really disappointing. It's the same issue even if we use it vertically or horizontally or even with less water in the reservoir. Would not recommend this.
Really powerful steamer! Gets the job done and really easy to use
